title: HVAC Mechanic or Mechanic Apprentice
status: Full Time, 40 hours per week (year round, 239 day calendar)Minimum Requirements forHVAC Mechanic:High school diploma or general education degree (GED) and completion of a certified HVAC/R training program at an accredited technical college (or equivalent); or equivalent combination of education and directly related experience is required.  5 years commercial HVAC experience preferred.Must have experience working on electric motors and starters of various sizes and voltages is required; knowledge of VFD's and ability to work with these systems is beneficial.  Must have and maintain a valid Utah Driver’s License.The salary for this position is assigned to Level 8 of the MN Salary Schedule.To view the salary schedule, please select the following linkMN Salary Schedule.Minimum Requirements forHVAC Mechanic Apprentice:High school diploma or general education degree (GED) and completion of a certified HVAC/R training program at an accredited technical college (or equivalent); or equivalent combination of education and directly related experience is required.   A training schedule is available on the HVAC Mechanice Apprentice job description.  Must have and maintain a valid Utah Driver’s License.The salary for this position may begin on lane 4 (or higher) of the MN Salary Schedule, dependent on the training schedule placement.To view the salary schedule, please select the following linkMN Salary Schedule.Attachment(s):HVAC Mechanic Apprentice ADDENDUM.pdfHVAC Mechanic.pdfEmail To A FriendPrint Version
